Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I'm working on a KSP christmas video and was wondering if there is a mod that can control the emotions of the kerbals?

Thanks in advance!
I asked for this a while back. No luck I'm afraid :'C

There is a function in the game code which controls the face animations. So in theory it is possible for modders to change the emotes. Though I have no idea what calls this function. (I didn't check.)
